resources.string: This app is in no way affiliated with or endorsed by Disney or Lucasfilm. I do not claim to own Star Wars or any of its related copyrights or trademarks. The use of Star Wars content in this app is protected under Fair Use.
Welcome to the Star Wars Canon Tracker app. I hope it is to your liking. Click on "Settings" in the navigation to change the text for the checkboxes and to permanently filter out certain media types.
Version 0.1.4: This update should improve stability (i.e. the app shouldn\'t crash so much anymore).

Version 0.1.0: Initial release! Hooraaaay! I\'m still working on fixing up release dates, images, and timeline in the database. It should automatically update when I do that. This app downloads the database and images, so try not to use it without wifi for now. Future versions will have an option to not download unless on wifi.
